"I only hope that Gangon dies the most horrorble death possible! Let's go!"
Deemos says. Stronghold and Blender follow close behind Deemos, to guard
him, as it was part of their job. Rizopas watched Sharpedge while he left.
Deemos ordered Plintissa to come. It was in her mind that she had to come,
even if she didn't want to, which she didn't, she had to. Deemos was
delighted to see Plintissa come with them. He would rather have her than
Gangon. Tesifier laughs as he finishes his rehearsal for the killing of
KitKat and follows the group.

"Serge, where are you?" Deemos asked through comm.

"Fighting with a Predacon, a new one." Serge says back. Doom Ice stands back
and lets Serge have his fun. Airbomber and Time Warp watch them go.

"They have so much fun that they never include us in. Is it because we're
small?" Time Warp asks.

"It's because we aren't loyal." Airbomber says. They both watch these bots
leave.

"Hey! Wait for Diskus!" Diskus says, flying after Deemos...
